ygData.subject: Another Question
ygData.msgSnippet: Salutations All! Does anyone know if I have two computers in my house with seperate axcess to EQ if I could run the same copy of EQ on both? Assuming I have
ygData.messageBody:
Salutations All!

Does anyone know if I have two computers in my house
with seperate axcess to EQ if I could run the same
copy of EQ on both? Assuming I have access for both to
the internet at the same time which I dont but soon
will could I run the same copy of EQ at the same time
and have two characters online controled by two
people? Or, would I have to have two paid accounts to
do this?

Just wondering if anyone might know the answer to
that. If no one knows the answer for sure does anyone
have any suggestions of places to start looking for an
answer, or who I should contact?

:o)
Bran
